about_the_game:
Children disappeared, adults turned into carrion...
A certain isolated island that turned into hell
Collect "relics" sleeping on the island and acquire skills.
Take on mysteries and powerful enemies using a variety of actions!
A dark fantasy 2D action game by Magus, the girl in black.

Dark and rich 2D action all drawn with pixelart!
Enjoy the action of the player charactor ”Magus” with classic and easy-to-understand controls!
Revive the attacking opponent and use it as a trigger for jumping through walls, etc.
Don't just defeat the enemy, use a variety of skills to move forward!
The dramatic truth surrounding the girls Mags, where guilt, anger, and sadness intertwine.

  • OS *: WindowsR 8/8.1/10 (64bit)
